newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Alex. Brown started.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Alex. Brown started.

text.p: -- Smith Barney initiated coverage of Alex. Brown Inc as neutral, a Smith Barney source said.
-- Alex. Brown gained 3/8 to 61-3/8 in morning trading.
-- Earlier this week, Alex Brown agreed to merge with Bankers Trust New York Corp.
